titles.title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize a grant program improving treatment for pregnant and postpartum women.
To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize a grant program improving treatment for pregnant and postpartum women.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: This bill amends the Public Health Service Act to extend through FY2023 a grant program for public and nonprofit private entities that provide residential treatment programs for pregnant and postpartum women being treated for substance use disorders.
